name: Photoria
description:
You had to make an emergency landing on a vacant planet, having not enough fuel to continue your journey.

Luckily the hostile creatures on this planet called Photoria provide you with the needed resources to power your ship again.

Now you have to defeat the big slimes in order to survive and gather everything that is needed.

Controlls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Mouse

Terraforming: E

Source:

https://github.com/meisterfuu/gamejam15
